html:
3D Asset Development

Games Art and Concept Art both make extensive use of 3D modelling, texturing and rendering. This module will introduce you to the techniques used in industry to produce assets for a variety of uses.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Apply appropriate 3D creation techniques to produce a series of modelled and textured, assets.

+  Demonstrate problem solving skills by solving a series of 3D modelling challenges.

+  Effectively communicate the design process, using current industry standard technologies and workflows in the production of 3D assets.

+  Reflect upon the creation and iteration of produced assets based on use of industry workflows.

Module Content:
